metadata.name: 8 Hanabi - Genesis#1
metadata.description: Made from 158 hand-drawn traits, 8 Hanabi is a generative NFT collection of 8,888 unique characters known as The Hanabians. In the world of 8 Hanabi, Dark Energy known as Yami-ki has been spreading amongst commoners, and the affected ones will commit atrocious deeds and eventually become demonized. The Hanabians, comprised of 8 clans, have maintained the world's balance in the dark and have done so for the past 776 years.Over the years, the Yami-ki has been spreading exponentially, and the elders of the 8 Hanabi predict that world chaos is imminent.
